title: Why does it seem like more and more rappers are getting killed in the last couple of years? Are rappers the ‘new target’? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s the cultures of violence & crime we live in, with jealousy, greed, etc. motivating those who were left behind or competing. But that way of life is nothing new … as much as I hate people squealing “It’s like the Wild West!” when gun related tragedies happen, that kind of reaction is a understandable reflection of an unstable part of American culture. Call me an old broad (not Boomer, but Generation X), but I also feel it’s also a shame about how we “normies” never hear of these young ambitious men until they get cut down way too soon.

They're almost all violent criminals! Rapists, murderers, drug dealers and heavy drug users, child and spousal abusers. And that's just the stuff they're most proud of. What's amazing is that so many of them survive as long as they do.
